hero.role: Full Stack Developer, Team Leader & AI Innovator
hero.description: Award-winning full stack developer with expertise in MERN Stack and Artificial Intelligence, combining technological innovation with positive impact.

dev.leftDescription: Full stack development expert with mastery in React, Node.js, MongoDB, and mobile technologies. Creating intuitive and responsive digital experiences that transform how businesses operate.
dev.rightDescription: Versatile developer with proven track record in delivering robust solutions in React Native, Next.js, and the entire MERN stack, always prioritizing user experience and process efficiency.

iainovator.leftDescription: Award-winning AI solutions developer, winner of Hack for Change 2023 with RecicleLink and top 6 at AI Immersion by Alura + Google with image recognition for natural disaster aid.
iainovator.rightDescription: Specialist in implementing machine learning models for logistics process optimization and intelligent quotation systems, combining advanced technology with positive social impact.

dungeonMaster.leftDescription: Narrating stories in dystopian universes and exploring the impact of technology and humanity in fantastic worlds.
dungeonMaster.rightDescription: Developing leadership skills, narrative, and collaborative creation through RPG.

forestFarmer.leftDescription: Growing organic and sustainable food while applying sustainability practices.
forestFarmer.rightDescription: Uniting technology and nature towards a more sustainable and balanced future.

teamLeader.leftDescription: Technical leader with proven track record in transforming startups through technological innovation. Expanding teams from 1 to 5 developers and increasing client base by 200% through strategic solutions.
teamLeader.rightDescription: Expert in establishing and leading software development departments, implementing agile methodologies and modern tools to optimize processes and ensure high-quality deliveries.

recicleLink.title: RecicleLink
recicleLink.description: Award-winning platform at Hack for Change 2023 that connects recyclers to recyclable materials using AI.

rescueVision.title: Scooby Doo Where Are You?
rescueVision.description: Image recognition system for pet rescue in natural disasters. Top 6 at AI Immersion Alura + Google.

logisticAI.title: Fretador App
logisticAI.description: Logistics solutions platform integrating Shippers and Freighters with Technology
